Name: team_has_skill
Description: Ensure each team member possesses necessary skills.

Name: sprint_goal_defined
Description: Every sprint must have a clearly defined goal.

Name: blocker_severity_high
Description: Critical blockers must be addressed immediately.

Name: feature_documentation_complete
Description: All features must have comprehensive documentation.

Name: user_story_acceptance_criteria_defined
Description: Each user story must have clearly defined acceptance criteria.

Name: velocity_consistent
Description: Maintain a consistent team velocity across sprints.

Name: team_member_availability_high
Description: Team members must be highly available during sprints.

Name: feature_priority_high
Description: Features with high priority must be addressed first.

Name: stakeholder_relevance_high
Description: Stakeholders relevant to features must be engaged.

Name: release_feature_status_complete
Description: Features in release plan must be completed.

Name: roadmap_milestone_achieved
Description: Roadmap milestones should be achieved as planned.

Name: epic_status_in_progress
Description: Epics must be in progress for development.

Name: sprint_backlog_status_todo
Description: Sprint Backlog tasks should be in 'To Do' status.

Name: sprint_review_attendance_at_least_one
Description: Sprint reviews should have at least one attendee.

Name: sprint_planning_outcome_documented
Description: Sprint planning outcomes must be documented.

Name: scrum_master_experience_high
Description: Scrum masters must have adequate experience.
